title: Nicola Sturgeon 'leading SNP into cul-de-sac by rejecting independence referendum alternatives'
text:
Nicola Sturgeon is leading the SNP into a political "cul-de-sac" by refusing to consider more radical ways of getting independence than another referendum, one of her most senior MPs has warned.

Speaking ahead of Sunday's opening of the SNP conference in Aberdeen, Angus MacNeil urged the First Minister to drop her insistence that a legal referendum is the only way for Scotland to separate from the UK.

The Western Isles MP warned Ms Sturgeon that it is "easy" for Boris Johnson to reject any official demand she makes for the powers to stage another vote on breaking up Britain.

He argued she needs to "carry a stick" in her dealings with the Prime Minister by threatening to push ahead with independence...
description: Nicola Sturgeon is leading the SNP into a political "cul-de-sac" by refusing to consider more radical ways of getting independence than another referendum, one of her most senior MPs has warned.
